lesson_id: An ID that determines which lessons are scheduled for that day. It may vary due to certain factors. If today has no lesson id, no activities.

normal.description: Default day schedule: each lesson is 55 minutes. First activity runs from 8:00 AM to 8:30 AM.
normal.condition: Used on any day that is NOT designated as an uncle day.

uncle_day.description: Special schedule: each lesson is 35 minutes. First activity runs from 8:00 AM to 8:25 AM, with two recesses and one lunch break.
uncle_day.condition: Used if today is Friday OR the schedule explicitly designates it as an uncle day.

break.description: Refers to recess or lunch time. Usually after two lessons.

rollcall: Activity after lunch time, lasting 5 minutes.
reinforcement: The last activity of the schedule on a normal day, lasting 30 minutes.

life_education.description: A 2 hours and 5 minutes activity on uncle day, scheduled as the last activity.
